Typekit.description: Typekit is an online service which offers a subscription library of fonts.

SquareSpace.description: Squarespace provides Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) for website building and hosting, and allows users to use pre-built website templates.

Nginx.description: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache.

Google Font API.description: Google Font API is a web service that supports open-source font files that can be used on your web designs.
